sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
German: Der Kriegsschrei für Gerechtigkeit war überall auf dem Chagrin der Behörden.
backtrans: The cry of war for justice was everywhere on the chagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
German: Die Entscheidung des Regimes adumbriert die zugrunde liegende Agenda.
backtrans: The decision of the regime adverters the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
German: Die Gemeinde war besorgt über die dringend benötigten Reformen.
backtrans: The community was worried about the urgently needed reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
German: Der Think Tank veröffentlichte ein Papier, das ihre Entschuldigung der Kapitalbestrafung umrankt.
backtrans: The Think Tank published a paper that interverted her excuse the capital impact.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
German: Aught wurde von der Gültigkeit der Petition hinterlassen
backtrans: Aught was left by the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
German: Der Präsident ermahnte seine Minister, sich zu knicken, als der key-Oppositionsunterstützung für seinen wirtschaftlichen Plan kurzzusagen wollte.
backtrans: The President admonished his ministers to bend himself as the key opposition support for his economic plan wanted to commit.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
German: Die Wähler wurden geschraubt, um die Höhe des Griffs zu sehen.
backtrans: The voters were screwed to see the height of the handle.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
German: Die diskursive Erzählung des Anwalts schwankte die Jury.
backtrans: The discursive narrative of the lawyer swayed the jury.

German: Das Gericht hat der Gewalt eingedrungen!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
German: Der EU-Block widersetzte sich gegen eine ewige Auferlegung von Antidumpingmaßnahmen.
backtrans: The EU block resisted an eternal imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
German: Eine fulstaue Eulogie wurde vom schlauen Rathaus geliefert.
backtrans: A FULSTAUE Eulogie was delivered by the smart town hall.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
German: Die Gig-Economy-Agentur beschloss, die Erstattungen zu garnieren!
backtrans: The Gig Economy Agency decided to garnish the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
German: Mitglieder der anti-theokratischen revolutionären Bewegung stürzten die Kollegen in der Macht!
backtrans: Members of anti-theocratic revolutionary movement crashed colleagues in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
German: Die Verräter entschieden enttäuschend, mit den Kolonialisten zu kämpfen.
backtrans: The traitors decided disappointing to fight with the colonialists.
